My Work

Check out some of my projects.

PyChess
×

Python Chess was a project I made that uses a min-max algorithm with alpha-beta pruning. The decision function uses piece values and piece tables to get the best move. Games can be played against the AI or human

Github
Football Predictions
×

For this project I scraped football-data.com website for English Premier League stats. I then used pandas to extract features from the data and train a machine learning model. I have been able to get around 54% accuracy. I plan on updating this as the season progresses to see how many results the model accuratley predicted.

Github
Discogs Cover Search
×

This is a project I created to help a friend who was transferring his record collection from vinyl to digital. It first reads headers from a csv file to create search params and confirms this with the user. Then is uses OAuth to create a connection to Discogs API. It then uses these params to search the Discogs database for corresponding covers and saves these.

Github
Temperature Monitor
×

This is simple application to monitor system device temperatures on Linux systems. I used PyQt5 for the GUI. It allows users to log temperatures to a csv file. This simple applicatiton could easily be changed to throttle controls, or monitor temps from and externel source, etc.
